content: मूल्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be eradicated. {@--2@} Being at the root. {@--3@} Purchasable. --ल्यं {@--1@} Price, worth, cost; क्रीणंति स्म प्राणमूल्यैर्यशांसि <ls>Śi. 18. 15</ls>, <ls>Śānti. 1. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Wages, hire, salary. {@--3@} Gain. {@--4@} Capital, principal. {@--5@} Original value. {@--6@} An article purchased.
